snippet: MORDFIN--Renee. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Renee Mordfin, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Renee's beloved husband, Jerry; her children, Stuart (Lily), Susan Hodder (Kane), and Rose Appel (Seth); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: MORDFIN--Renee. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Renee Mordfin, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Renee's beloved husband, Jerry; her children, Stuart (Lily), Susan Hodder (Kane), and Rose Appel (Seth); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
